description: Luffy bites into his thumb joint and blows air directly into his bones, inflating them to giant size. This gives his limbs tremendous mass and power, allowing for devastating attacks at the cost of mobility.

keyMoments.title: Gear 3 Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gear 3 for the first time to destroy a massive steel door, though only his shadow is visible during this initial use.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the introduction of one of Luffy's signature power-ups that will be used throughout the series.

strengths: Can break through extremely hard materials
weaknesses: Shrinking side effect after use (shown in later episodes)
Leaves user vulnerable due to slower movement

reveals.information: Gear 3 works by inflating the user's bones with air to create giant-sized limbs

description: A Rokushiki technique where the user launches a punch at the same speed as Shigan but uses their entire fist instead of a single finger, creating a more powerful impact.

keyMoments.title: Fukurou's Jugon
keyMoments.description: Fukurou demonstrates his signature Jugon technique against Franky, claiming it's faster and stronger than normal Shigan.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Fukurou's unique variation of Rokushiki martial arts.

strengths: Shigan-level speed with full fist impact
Greater striking power than finger-based Shigan
Effective against armored or cyborg opponents

description: An advanced technique where Fukurou rapidly launches multiple Jugon punches simultaneously at extreme speed, creating the illusion of multiple copies attacking at once.

keyMoments.title: Fukuro Dataki Barrage
keyMoments.description: Fukurou unleashes a rapid-fire barrage of Jugon punches, demonstrating his mastery of Rokushiki.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Fukurou's advanced combat capabilities and Rokushiki expertise.

strengths: Difficult to defend against due to speed and quantity
Combines Soru speed with Jugon power

name.japanese: フランキートライアングルジャッカー

description: Franky shoots his razor-sharp modified sideburns at opponents as projectile weapons. The sideburns are strong enough to carve stone and regenerate immediately after being fired.

keyMoments.title: Triangle Jacker Against Fukurou
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his Triangle Jacker technique against Fukurou, who dodges using Soru.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates one of Franky's unique cyborg weapon capabilities.

weaknesses: Can be dodged by fast opponents

description: A comically weak punch that occurs when Franky is powered by vegetable juice instead of cola. Despite Franky's normal strength, this attack does no damage and represents his malfunction when using incorrect fuel.

keyMoments.title: Fresh Franky's Vegetable Punch
keyMoments.description: While powered by vegetable juice and sporting onion-shaped hair, Franky's punch becomes completely ineffective.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the comedic element of Franky's beverage-dependent power system.

weaknesses: Demonstrates Franky's dependence on proper fuel

reveals.information: Franky's combat abilities are entirely dependent on being fueled by cola - other beverages make him weak or change his personality
